channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 台积电Q4利润下滑23% 今年重点关注需求反弹
item.description: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co Ltd , is expected to report a 23% drop in fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, but analysts predict better growth this year on the back of rebounding demand.翻译:台积电周四预计第四季度利润下降 23%，但分析师预计，由于需求反弹，今年的增长将有所改善。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 黑石集团将扩大新加坡私募股权投资人员数量以进军东南亚
item.description: Blackstone Inc , the world's largest alternative asset manager, will double its private equity business headcount in Singapore within the next two years, a top executive said, as it looks to tap into a growing number of deals in Southeast Asia.翻译:一位高管表示，全球最大的另类资产管理公司黑石公司将在未来两年内将其在新加坡私募股权业务的员工人数增加一倍，因为该公司希望在东南亚进行越来越多的交易。
item.author: Yantoultra Ngui, Kane Wu, M. Sriram

item.title: 马科斯总统祝贺台湾黎智英后菲​​律宾重申“一个中国政策”
item.description: The Philippines' foreign ministry on Tuesday reaffirmed the country's "One China policy" after its president, Ferdinand Marcos Jr., congratulated Taiwan's new leader Lai Ching-te.翻译:在菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯向台湾新领导人赖清德表示祝贺后，菲律宾外交部周二重申了该国的“一个中国政策”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 交易员权衡降息押注和红海紧张局势，美元上涨
item.description: The dollar rose on Tuesday as investors pared back bets on near-term rate-cuts by the U.S. Federal Reserve following hawkish comments from European Central Bank officials, while worries of more attacks on ships in the Red Sea weighed on risk sentiment.翻译:美元周二上涨，因欧洲央行官员发表强硬言论后，投资者削减了对美联储近期降息的押注，同时对红海船只遭受更多袭击的担忧打压了风险情绪。
item.author: Ankur Banerjee

item.title: 美国谴责瑙鲁“不幸”放弃台湾，并对中国的承诺发出警告
item.description: The U.S. official who heads the body that handles unofficial ties with Taiwan on Tuesday decried Nauru's "unfortunate" decision to break ties with Taipei shortly after an election and warned that Beijing's promises often go unfulfilled.翻译:周二，负责处理与台湾非正式关系的机构负责人的美国官员谴责瑙鲁在选举后不久做出与台北断绝关系的“不幸”决定，并警告说北京的承诺往往没有兑现。
item.author: Ben Blanchard

item.title: 股市下滑，美元因利率前景紧张而上涨
item.description: Asian shares dropped to a one-month low, U.S. stock futures fell and the dollar rose on Tuesday as hawkish remarks from central bankers tempered expectations for interest rate cuts and traders waited to hear from the Fed's influential Christopher Waller.翻译:周二，亚洲股市跌至一个月低点，美国股指期货下跌，美元上涨，原因是央行行长的鹰派言论削弱了降息预期，且交易员等待美联储颇具影响力的克里斯托弗·沃勒(Christopher Waller)的讲话。
item.author: Tom Westbrook

item.title: 早盘竞价：日本股市强势崛起
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: ABB董事长认为红海扰乱的影响有限
item.description: Swiss engineering group ABB sees limited impact from disruptions in the Red Sea on its supply chains, Chairman Peter Voser said in an interview on Monday ahead of the World Economic Forum's (WEF) annual meeting in Davos.翻译:瑞士工程集团 ABB 董事长 Peter Voser 周一在达沃斯世界经济论坛 (WEF) 年会之前接受采访时表示，红海中断对其供应链的影响有限。
item.author: Divya Chowdhury, Savio Shetty

item.title: 阿斯利康表示，到目前为止，红海中断并未造成供应中断
item.description: Drugmaker AstraZeneca has not seen any supply issues so far due to Red Sea shipping disruptions, a top executive told Reuters ahead of the World Economic Forum (WEF) on Monday.翻译:制药商阿斯利康（AstraZeneca）周一在世界经济论坛（WEF）前夕向路透社表示，到目前为止，尚未发现因红海运输中断而出现任何供应问题。
item.author: Divya Chowdhury, Savio Shetty

item.title: 瑞士应泽连斯基要求主办乌克兰和平峰会
item.description: Switzerland on Monday agreed to host a global peace summit on Ukraine at the request of Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy.翻译:应乌克兰总统泽伦斯基的要求，瑞士周一同意主办乌克兰问题全球和平峰会。
item.author: John Revill

item.title: 2024 年的预期：美联储转向、通胀降温、增长放缓
item.description: Global growth will likely slow this year, but a dovish tilt in the Federal Reserve's stance has raised hopes for the U.S. economy and brightened the outlook for riskier assets, according to big banks.翻译:大型银行表示，今年全球经济增长可能会放缓，但美联储立场的鸽派倾斜提高了人们对美国经济的希望，并提振了风险资产的前景。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 2024 年达沃斯：Bajaj Finserv 首席执行官表示，印度正处于 FDI 洪流的风口浪尖
item.description: By Una Galani and Antoni Slodkowski翻译:作者：乌纳·加拉尼和安东尼·斯洛德科夫斯基
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 格鲁吉亚执政党领导人访华推动深化双边关系
item.description: The leader of Georgia's ruling party began a six-day visit to China on Monday, as the European Union candidate member country seeks to deepen its relations with Beijing, Georgian media reported.翻译:据格鲁吉亚媒体报道，格鲁吉亚执政党领导人周一开始对中国进行为期六天的访问，这个欧盟候选成员国寻求深化与北京的关系。
item.author: Felix Light

item.title: 玩具制造商从中国转移并非易事
item.description: Toy makers grappling with surging costs in China are finding no easy options when it comes to shifting production to cheaper places.翻译:正在努力应对中国成本飙升的玩具制造商在将生产转移到更便宜的地方时没有找到简单的选择。
item.author: Richa Naidu

item.title: 中国与瑞士签署扩大贸易宣言
item.description: China and Switzerland signed a joint declaration on Monday agreeing to deepen their partnership after Premier Li Qiang met the Swiss President, the Swiss government said.翻译:瑞士政府表示，李强总理会见瑞士总统后，中国和瑞士周一签署了一份联合声明，同意深化合作伙伴关系。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 危地马拉自由派新领导人反腐面临巨大障碍
item.description: Guatemala's new liberal president, Bernardo Arevalo, took office early on Monday after an extended delay that underlined the uphill struggle he faces to meet high expectations and enact a sweeping anti-graft agenda in opposition-controlled Congress.翻译:危地马拉新任自由派总统贝尔纳多·阿雷瓦洛(Bernardo Arevalo)在长期拖延后于周一早些时候上任，这突显了他在满足高期望和在反对派控制的国会中制定全面反腐败议程方面面临着艰巨的斗争。
item.author: Sofia Menchu

item.title: 解释者：胡塞武装袭击暴露了中国在红海的商业利益
item.description: China has called for an end to attacks on civilian vessels in the Red Sea that have dramatically widened the Hamas-Israel conflict and placed Beijing's commercial interests along the Suez Canal at risk.翻译:中国呼吁停止对红海民用船只的袭击，这种袭击极大地扩大了哈马斯与以色列的冲突，并使北京在苏伊士运河沿岸的商业利益面临风险。
item.author: Joe Cash

item.title: 朝鲜黑客与犯罪分子在东南亚共享洗钱网络 - 联合国
item.description: North Korean hackers are sharing money-laundering and underground banking networks with fraudsters and drug traffickers in Southeast Asia, according to a United Nations report published on Monday, with casinos and crypto exchanges emerging as key venues for organised crime.翻译:根据周一发布的联合国报告，朝鲜黑客正在与东南亚的欺诈者和毒贩共享洗钱和地下银行网络，赌场和加密货币交易所成为有组织犯罪的主要场所。
item.author: Tom Wilson

item.title: 解释者：为什么马尔代夫希望印度军队撤离
item.description: The new Maldives president set a deadline on Sunday of March 15 for its giant neighbour India to withdraw all its troops from the tiny Indian Ocean archipelago nation.翻译:马尔代夫新任总统于 3 月 15 日星期日为邻国印度设定了从这个印度洋群岛小国撤军的最后期限。
item.author: Krishn Kaushik

item.title: 2024年中国经济增速预计将放缓至4.6%，引发政策制定者的关注
item.description: China's economic growth is likely to slow to 4.6% in 2024, and cool further to 4.5% in 2025, a Reuters poll showed, raising the heat on policymakers to roll out more stimulus measures amid deflationary pressures and a severe property slump.翻译:路透调查显示，中国经济增长可能在2024年放缓至4.6%，并在2025年进一步降温至4.5%，在通货紧缩压力和房地产严重下滑的情况下，政策制定者推出更多刺激措施的压力加大。
item.author: Kevin Yao
